content: holiday table snowflake crochet holiday table snowflake crochet this pattern is incredibly easy quick and versatile bring some cheer to your holiday table as a coaster or cutlery holder or add a hanger to make an ornament i originally saw this snowflake already worked up but the company and pattern it came from now seem to be gone so i recreated this version as closely as possible if you happen to recognize where it came from instead of my dead end let me know as i d prefer to credit properly yarn & hook honestly you can use any yarn and appropriate hook size that you like the examples i ve pictured here are made with 2 strands of sock/fingering weight yarn held together and an f/5 3 75mm hook i m a tight crocheter so adjust accordingly yardage will vary based on what you use but it s a pretty small item and won t require much it s a great stash buster yarn as pictured below all from malabrigo hojas mechita carnaval sock oro ultimate sock granada mechita © 2024 jay s chain 3 as your first incomplete treble_crochet then proceed as usual you will have 1 less loop than normal for your final pull through notes starting chains do count as stitches each round ends by
